mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.hetong_uuid_number as hetongUuidNumber ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.kaoqin_types as kaoqinTypes ,a.kaoqin_content as kaoqinContent ,a.kaoqin_time as kaoqinTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yuangong.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail ,yuangong.ruzhi_time as ruzhiTime
FROM kaoqin a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.hetong_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.hetongUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.kaoqin_types = #{params.kaoqinTypes}
and a.kaoqin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoqinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yuangong.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yuangong.ruzhi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.ruzhiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yuangong.ruzhi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.ruzhiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yuangong.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yuangong.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
